summary: Provides comprehensive unit and integration tests for the CogVideoX image‑to‑video generation pipeline, verifying core functionality, performance optimizations (attention slicing, fused QKV, VAE tiling), batch consistency, callback handling, and end‑to‑end execution with real model components.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, correctness, and efficiency of the video generation service by detecting regressions and validating optimizations before deployment.
